channel.title: Onetab on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Onetab on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Mindfulness about what you're doing with OneTab
item.description: I use OneTab (see: previously) to manage the tabs on my Chrome browser. It does a great job of sweeping a bunch of current state for open tabs onto a page, so that you can get a fresh start when a new project comes up and then restore the state of the old one. It also means that I have a lot more working memory on my old MacBook. All in all a big win.
